overview: A couple believes in pragmatic love and not in eternal love. She finds out that she has cancer and decides to separate from her husband, to prevent him from suffering at her side; he seeks as an excuse the situation in Venezuela to migrate to Chile. He refuses to leave. She hides her illness from him, lies telling him that she does not love him. After she is in Chile, he learns the truth; He calls her on the phone to tell her that he will go to her side
title: Memorias En Tres Colores
